title: A year of market movement and trading opportunities
description: US inflation markets have been through some major events in 2012, including the launch of open-ended quantitative easing and knock-on effects from the forced unwind of Greek asset swaps. Against a backdrop of continued economic uncertainty, a raft of new rules are set to come into effect in 2013. Sponsored by BGC Partners and convened by Risk, leading inflation experts discuss how the inflation market has reacted â€“ and what the future holds
